page.title: 08BROWN AND HUNT COMPANY(CONT)
page.content: Brown and Hunt not only breed rare pigs but they also make fencing,this makes the farm a diversion farm.Mr Brown bought the land 4 years ago when it was on the market.It used to be an army camp in the second world war.The building that the fencing is made in, is the only building from the camp left.Mr. Brown has 16 staff and he has to work every day and he only has one week off per year. He hasn't any dislikes some he must like the sound of nails being shot into the wood!he hasn't got any plans for expansion because he is going to retire in about 2 years time. All the tools are run on compressed air which is cheaper and safer.
